website_summaries.verdict: These 2 bright outdoor pillows are a great size and come in a variety of designs.
pros: Hold up well in the weather
cons: Pillows are actually smaller than the advertised 17-square-inch size

customer_reviews.title: Good fabric, poorly sewn
customer_reviews.text: When they say Cushion dimensions are +/- 2 inches that is basically saying we are going to short you. I sew a lot and that is a quite a bit of allowance for dimension error. Passes for a 14" or 15" pillow. Good fabric, poorly sewn, certainly not overstuffed. Sorry I did not have time to sew them myself. I also bought a two pack of "Pillow Perfect" brand indoor/outdoor pillows on Amazon for $1.15 more. MUCH, much better quality, corded edges, true to size and overstuffed. Photo is of my Greendale Home Fashions 17" pillow next to my "Pillow Perfect" 18.5" pillow. See for yourself!
customer_reviews.author: B. Spray

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pillows
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with these. They add such a fun pop of color to my patio. Other reviews have complained about the size, but they are perfect for my furniture and I wouldn't want them any bigger. The fabric is thick and seems like it will be durable. They have the perfect about of puffiness. Maybe my expectations were lower than some but for twentyish dollars for two pillows I'm not and wasn't expecting these to last until the new millennium. However, the quality is great and I think they'll last a fair amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Spydar

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE these pillows
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these pillows. I ordered them for a bench on my back patio and they are just perfect. They arrived exactly when they said they would, look really nice and were very affordable. I had looked at a bunch in Home Goods and Target and these were much cheaper. I was worried that when they arrived they would look cheap, but they don't at all. I've gotten lots of compliments on them!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen McFee

customer_reviews.title: Misrepresented
customer_reviews.text: These are not as represented on your website. They are very small and overfilled. They are a very scant 13 inches in width and height and too costly for that size. I purposefully ordered the 17 inch size to fit in a specific area; I would return them, but I'm 81 and don't drive so getting them back is a major problem for me. I will remove some of the stuffing and put them to some use, though not for the one I intended.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Cottis

customer_reviews.title: Consistently great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. This is my second purchase. I bought the seat cushions earlier this year. The quality is consistent, it's excellent. The fabric is thick an durable. The print is vibrant, not at all thin. They are well stuffed, I think they would be called overstuffed pillows. Overstuffed being a good thing. I will continue to buy from these guys in the future.
customer_reviews.author: pgecco

customer_reviews.title: Lovely pillows!
customer_reviews.text: I love these pillows! The colors are bright and allow lots of different coordination options. Good quality fabric for outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: AMAZONIAN MAMA

customer_reviews.title: INDIGO AND OFF WHITE
customer_reviews.text: I bought the indigo and the white is not actually the pretty bright white shown in the picture but instead it's a slightly dingy off white. Also the blue is not as deep. They are ok I guess but if I had seen these on the store shelf I would have walked right past them.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful accent pillows at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Love these pillows. I bought the "Graphite" color, and despite the fact that they are described as a gray color in the above Questions section, I would say they are more like a dark Taupe and cream. So if you have "Greige" decor, these will go with other brown or gray tones. Our nation furniture is a muted dark teal, and these pillows look gorgeous against the teal. Stylish at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Described as Square Pillows, but Beware!
customer_reviews.text: The photo and description listed these as square pillows, but what arrived were rectangular lumbar pillows. I didn’t return them because of the hassle, but I’m very disappointed the photo and description were falsely portrayed.
customer_reviews.author: NF

customer_reviews.title: EVEN BETTER IN PERSON!! BEAUTIFUL COLORS GREAT FABRIC
customer_reviews.text: These come in several sizes so I purchased them along with smaller rectangular pillows and a porch swing cushion. I use the pillows on an outdoor sectional sofa that is teal in color. The fabric is very sturdy and absolutely stunning colors. I thought they were pretty on line but the pictures really don't do them justice. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Angela C. Purvis

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't hold up to Florida humidity
customer_reviews.text: These did not hold up for me as far as staying nice is concerned. They have mildew on them, or at least black marks on the white part of the pillow. They were pretty and I do live in Florida. So they get a real test here. I tried washing them but it didn't help. They have held up as far as their construction is concerned. I had high hopes.
customer_reviews.author: Mimix5

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and durability
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these pillows about 18 mos. ago for the bench on my front porch. The print is lively & “tropical” without being too “beachy,” and the colors have held up well all this time. Loved these pillows enough to go back Last month and order 2 more for my rocking chairs, also on my front porch. The new ones match the old exactly, proving that there’s been no fading of the color or pattern all these months. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent patio pillows
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the accent pillows. I purchased them to go with the red chairs on my patio and they are perfect. Even if they get rained on, I just let them dry and shake out the dust and they are fine. Nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dena Bee, CZT

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Bought to add pop of color to patio chairs. Very well made and design colorful. Also adds back support
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Just Plain Fun-colored and Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love the bright, festive colors! They brighten up my day every time I step out onto my front porch (they're on my porch swing). They're comfortable, durable, and inviting.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Peachy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and colors really pop with the orange cushions I have. They’re also really plump and not flimsy at all like some other throw pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Swinging Happy
customer_reviews.text: My husband built me a bench swing and these pillows are perfect for it! They're made of good, thicker material which is nice for outside. They feel well made, have a good amount of stuffing and they're gorgeous on my swing.
customer_reviews.author: ArtsyKy

customer_reviews.title: they're very nice, just a bit disappointed in the 2 inch ...
customer_reviews.text: These pillows were supposed to measure 17 inches---they are exactly 15 inches length and width. Other than that, they're very nice, just a bit disappointed in the 2 inch difference.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan V.

customer_reviews.title: They look great on my patio furniture!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality fabric and plump foam which support my back when I sit on my patio chairs. I try to keep them under the overhang but last week it rained and they got wet. The fabric is water resistant and they dried up nicely in the sun. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: wandalust4ever

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I truly never left these out to test for water resistance since I always bring my pillows and seat cushions into the house overnight or when not in use. The color is vivid and the softness helps cushion pressure points of my wicker outdoor set. I'll buy more when they have different styles in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle15

customer_reviews.title: I really like these!
customer_reviews.text: I try to purchase pillows made in the USA, but most are made with imported materials anyway these days. I decided to purchase these because they were on sale, and I'm really pleased with them! Color/pattern is great and matches what I see online with my kindle. I wish the covers were removable for washing, but I do recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Makuahine

customer_reviews.title: We love them!
customer_reviews.text: We bought a whole set for our patio furniture. They look great. We had ones by the same manufacturer before these and they lasted at least 5 years even left out year round during awful NW Indiana winters. THIS time, we're bringing them in during winter!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Cornett

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the pair
customer_reviews.text: Added to my new bench cushions on my old porch glider. They fill in the gaps on the end of the seat cushion. Adds color & pattern. Affordable & I can add a pillow cover for different seasons. A big hit with the family. (Bird pillows, I already had, from a Big Box store).
customer_reviews.author: Goge

customer_reviews.title: Super nice
customer_reviews.text: If you're expecting "soft" and cushy. Don't order these. They're more like a thick, stiffish canvas. But that's exactly what I wanted to decorate my outdoor patio with. Something to decorate and add color...not nap on. I feel like the fabric will hold up for a while, with this fabric. Nice and filled/plump enough to use as support, behind your back. If you want. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R. Schilling

customer_reviews.title: Quality of Stuffing Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: These were overstuffed and uneven which made it difficult to use on an outdoor chair. Sent back and order the smaller, longer version which are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Feedback

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Well Made
customer_reviews.text: I bought these pillows to go with the bench cushion I purchased previously. They are pretty and well made - so far no fading of any. The price seems to fluctuate - I think they are a bit pricey for outdoor pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Ktm

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color but thin fabric
customer_reviews.text: Love the color but the fabric is not the “outdoor” fabric as advertised. I purchased two yellow and two multi colored pillows from Greendale and the multi colored pillows were made to last with the outdoor fabric, these unfortunately were not. The price was good enough not to return so overall an ok purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cass Dogert

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my original set of outdoor Summer pillows in 2014. They are fantastic! They don't fade and are easy to clean. I love them so much I bought an additional set in 2017 and they match perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: True to color. Bright yellow
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pillows. They are true to color and add a nice pop of color to my balcony. I’ve had them for a couple months now. They haven’t faded. They hold up well in rain and snow. I did have a small spill and they were easy to clean. I recommend these pillows
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Mo

customer_reviews.title: Full cushion/pillow
customer_reviews.text: I thought these cushions looked great. They were very full and colorful. Our patio dining table chairs have deep seats and I wanted some cushions to make it more comfortable and so you didn't feel like you were sitting back so far. The only reason I returned them was that, used with the lumbar chair cushions I also purchased, it pushed you too far forward on the patio dining chair. These cushions are very full.
customer_reviews.author: Sally C.

customer_reviews.title: Durable quality
customer_reviews.text: Less vibrant than I expected them being (I bought the reddish striped ones) but I am actually pleased because the shade they came as matches my outdoor rug better than if the colors were to pop more. Happy with them but I will need to be buying 24" pillows instead, my sizing was off.
customer_reviews.author: smash

customer_reviews.title: Over time went flat.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased about 4 months ago for our living room. I even purchased a new ottoman to coordinate- much to my displeasure after several months. These have gone flat. You can see the difference in the image I took, contrasted with another pillow I purchased. For an area where you don't ever sit/touch them it would likely work long term, but for used areas I would buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Family

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and perfect for my porch
customer_reviews.text: works great with my porch furniture. I have a turquoise rug and love the pop of yellow! FULL PILLOWS instead of just pillow cases which i found over and over on all the searches. I wanted a FULL PILLOW like this and it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: caribeabi34

customer_reviews.title: Paisley Perfection
customer_reviews.text: My paisley outdoor pillows are exactly as I had hoped. They are bright and colorful and look lovely on the chairs on my Lanai. They are sturdy, yet comfortable. So glad I bought them!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Ann, Florida

customer_reviews.title: Lumpy
customer_reviews.text: They look a bit smaller that 17" square because they are a bit overstuffed and makes them look lumpy too. They're actually stuffed in the wrong areas or stuffed more in some areas than others making them look lumpy. The print is pretty. I bought 2 just to check it out but won't be buying another pair. I'll look for 2 other solid-colored pillows to compliment the colors of these cushions. Good for outside use in patio.
customer_reviews.author: NicoyitaMSN

customer_reviews.title: Bright colors
customer_reviews.text: Great outdoor accent pillows. They were only out on the patio for October and November but seemed to hold their colors. Sun is still strong in the fall here in Southern California so I was pleased that they didn’t fade.
customer_reviews.author: ReReadable Booksellers

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Pillows
customer_reviews.text: I really like these little pilows. They are made of the exact fabric of pillows that I'd ordered from Pottery Barn last year. Of course, those from Pottery Barn has rolled edges, 20x20 size, and cost much much more! But these will work very well with my blue and white theme in our sunroom!! Can't beat the cost nor the timeliness of product receipt.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Cute.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color and pattern so I have them inside. Size and color what I expected. I got them for living room so I could wipe down when kids mess up. So for so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered!
customer_reviews.text: I'm kind of confused because the only thing I got in this delivery was pillow COVERS, not actual pillows?! Nowhere do I see in the description where it says only pillow covers, in fact it describes these "overstuffed" pillows. And looking at other reviews, other customers had gotten complete pillows! So I'm left very confused, and disappointed. The amount I paid isn't worth two mediocre pillow covers. Keeping them because I needed them quickly, but I do not recommend them unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Richele

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully vibrant and retro
customer_reviews.text: If i could leave more stars I would, these pillows are fantastic. They look exactly as represented, the size is perfect for what I needed. I love that they are made from sunbrella material which is durable and will be easy to clean. I already ordered two more to complete the look. We are using them as back pillows for kitchen chairs, they might compress a little too much to be used as a seating cushion. I am pretty sure the size refers to before it was sewn together?
customer_reviews.author: R. Marsden

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made
customer_reviews.text: These bright pillows are used on our outdoor furniture and set off their cobalt blue perfectly with their subtle, sophisticated pattern. They are very well made, we are delighted with them.
customer_reviews.author: Sandee Drabek

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed. I am unable to return at this time ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these pillows because it stated that they were 17”. Absolutely not true. These pillows are 12”. Buyer beware. I am very disappointed. I am unable to return at this time so I’m stuck with them. However, the pillows themselves are nice fabric and print.
customer_reviews.author: sulyQ

customer_reviews.title: Vivid, soft, and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Love this to accessorize my outdoor swing with a turquoise seat and backing. The colors are so vivid. This is the soft outdoor material and not the stiff material. Almost tempted to take them indoors for the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal b.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: The size and colors are exactly as shown and look great on the patio. I have not left them in the rain to see how water resistant they are soI can't say. But you can tell by the fabric that they would probably bead off the water for quite some time. The seam at the top shows but at least it's clear threading. I put the seam at the bottom for use. Never know how long patio pillows will last but these are durable and thick fabric. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Anonym

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Size
customer_reviews.text: These pillows were advertised as 17"x17" they're actuly14"x14". They do match the seat cushions I also bought so I will keep them. I'll will have to sew some ties on the corners so they can be hung high enough on the patio chair backs to be comfortable. This is an inconvenience but they are really nice pillows and not worth the time to return.
customer_reviews.author: R. King

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Ended up ordering two set by mistake. Order comes with two pillows. Worked great on bench I ordered and have also used them on living room sofa for support.
customer_reviews.author: Celina

customer_reviews.title: They are not good outdoor pillows
customer_reviews.text: They are rather smaller than expected and when my dog got mud on them, the mud would not wash out so now I have dirty pillows. They are also not royal blue, a very subdued dull navy blue.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Neuman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pillows that hold up well
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these pillows! I had them on two chairs on the front porch all last summer in full afternoon sun and they still look great. The colors don't even look like they've faded. They're really thick and have held up beautifully. The color is true to what is pictured online. Will definitely purchase again if I ever need to.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Nice and puffy but don't expect them to be 17"
customer_reviews.text: These are quite a bit smaller than I thought they would be.They didn't fit where I wanted to use it so I had to send them back. Nice and puffy but don't expect them to be 17". Probably more appropriate for 14" use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small set of chairs
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and have not faded and sit out very often in direct sun. Good for the price! Well made and perfect for our small patio set.
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: Vivid colors & comfort
customer_reviews.text: Love the color & texture. Using this pattern for my wicker dining chairs (backs & seat cushions) in patio sun room with glass tabletop. Looks great. Enjoying year round in all season glass sun room
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Mayson

customer_reviews.title: 14x14 inches
customer_reviews.text: These are advertised as 17x17 cushions, they are in fact 14x14. This constitutes false advertising. That said, I decided to keep them even though it was not what I expected size wise. Truth is the quality is great, so it is a keeper, but if the size matters get yourself ready to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, durable material for out door patio furniture. Worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Dickenson

customer_reviews.title: I have had these over 1 year. They still ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had these over 1 year. They still look new! I have two sets, one brown and one blue. The blues for the summer and the browns for the fall. I store in the winter in large trash bags in the garage. I leave them out on a porch for the whole season.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth W.

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor pillows
customer_reviews.text: Love the yellow pillows. They add just the right amount of color and support to this metal bench on my front porch. Side note, I bought the bench cushion from another Amazon seller. It all came together perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Walton

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pillows
customer_reviews.text: I can’t rave enough about these pillows. I bought them in 2018 it has rained and hot sunny summers these pillows have not faded. They still look brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Cheery and Welcoming to all Visitors.
customer_reviews.text: I searched a long time, looking for the right colors, and style in a durable fabric. We have a winner. I love these. Very cheery and welcoming on our front porch.
customer_reviews.author: Brooksidecourt

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love these pillows! Very durable and well made. I’ve had mine outside for months now getting rained on and they still look good as new
customer_reviews.author: Camry S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality Pillows. Very Plump and Attractive with Bright Colors
customer_reviews.text: These are very plump pillows and are very bright and attractive. They rest on a Pillow Perfect lime green cushion on a glider in my gazebo. The colors pick up the lime green of the cushion and the bright blue color of the glider very nicely. The look really brightens up the gazebo and looks so summery. I love the look and have received many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Judith S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy
customer_reviews.text: These look great! I did cut the tag off of them because it is long. I purchased four for my front porch chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Neki

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for years now. They are durable and have not faded. I am also surprised they have not blown away. These pillows add a fun splash of color to my front porch and chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: this feels more like an outdoor pillow...
customer_reviews.text: I guess i didn't read the description very well because these are quite a bit smaller than i expected them to be. The material is also not very soft...I bought them for inside on my couch but they feel much more like an all-weather outdoor pillow to me. They are kind of scratchy and I sure as heck won't be putting my cheek on them to take a nap! I really like the design so I suppose I will be moving them to my patio. They are quite thick and fluffy and the picture is an exact color match to what you get.
customer_reviews.author: abbychowmane

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor pillows!
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I was looking for to use on our front porch bench! They have weathered well and are vibrant in color. Excellent value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany & Ian B

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and cute designs!
customer_reviews.text: Matches my outdoor set perfectly. Great purchase. The pillows have held up very well for the past 2 years I’ve had them. The colors have held up as well and have no faded over time.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I love the grass color and pattern, looks great on my beige colored outdoor sofa. So far they have held up well on the veranda and have not faded.
customer_reviews.author: CaiusM

customer_reviews.title: The colors are beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the large seat cushion and 2 throw pillows for my red steel retro style glider. It looks great. Came nicely boxed. Colors are beautiful and quality is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: D M Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Great pattern for outside!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful pop of color that high lights colors already present. Well made and they seem durable.
customer_reviews.author: Caretia

customer_reviews.title: Pillows
customer_reviews.text: Love the pattern on these pillows! Worked well and looked beautiful for their first season of use. Can't wait to show them back off in the spring with my red outdoor sectional.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Geiger

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied 100%
customer_reviews.text: Pillows look great well made. Right size for a chair and a person. Good item very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not 17 in
customer_reviews.text: Not 17 in. More like 12. Very dissatisfied with the size. Not as good for price when you ate getting much smaller pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy fabric, firm pillow. The colors are vibrant. Pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieO

customer_reviews.title: Indoor/outdoor tropical fabric is vibrant and pretty in these pillows.
customer_reviews.text: I like these pillows because they match the seat cushions of the same pattern, and material I also ordered. Also I wish they came zippered for removal but they will probably someday wash get tossed in the washer.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality outdoor pillows. I've already had them out in the elements (surprise rain storm)...so far so good. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy Cass

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have these on my front porch swing. They are weather resistant and the color still looks wonderful. Heavy enough they will not blow away during storm.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I’m happy!
customer_reviews.text: These pillows are so pretty and the right amount of pop. So vibrant. I love the colors mixed in together.
customer_reviews.author: MiraAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Second time purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pillows and good value - I have owned a different color set of them from this brand before and they lasted three years with minimal fading on my front porch rockers that get direct daytime sun. In fact, they are still in good shape but because they had white in them look a little dingy so I updated with these green ones that don't have white in them.
customer_reviews.author: Jo M

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love these ordered a bunch through Amazon warehouse and they were all in good shape
customer_reviews.author: Lor Dooley

customer_reviews.title: As advertised and thus just right!
customer_reviews.text: I like that they are just as advertised and shown. I also like how fast they came to me, and without me having to drive anywhere, stand in any lines, potentially not find what I wanted, etc. LOVE Amazon Smile shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Jerio

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, thick material clearly meant for outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: I adore these pillows. I'm using these on brown wicker chairs with a green cushion from the same vendor. Good quality, thick material clearly meant for outdoor use. I also bought the lumbar pillows in the same pattern for my green chaise lounges. Just lovely. Really brightens up the deck.
customer_reviews.author: Aviva Gittle Publishing

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and great value!
customer_reviews.text: These are great outdoor pillows! The color is vibrant, they are nice and fluffy, and just as described. This is actually the second time I’ve ordered these, and they hold up pretty well over time, even left outside in the elements. I’ve had the others for over a year, and although the colors do fade slightly, and they’ve flattened a bit, it’s still a great value for the money! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty cushions.
customer_reviews.text: Love this pattern. Needed cushions for a deep seat set of patio furniture. These pillows compliment the Shoreham pattern nicely with a solid green I bought to match. Quality workmanship - solid/clean seams, holds up to so cal weather nicely, comfortable back support, pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Karen T.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Holding up in the southern sun! Good quality, inexpensive item. Love the pattern
customer_reviews.author: Kmaasify

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: After over a year outdoors, uncovered, in Colorado weather, these pillows have held up amazingly. Very happy with the quality and am ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Rath Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good Decor, Fair Durability
customer_reviews.text: They are good for decorative pillows but not necessarily the best quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Front Porch Rocker Pillows
customer_reviews.text: Great outdoor pillows. The were the perfect match on our black front porch rockers to our coral colored front door. Brings everything together. Fade resistant and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I searched high and low for a nicely padded one that would match my red swing
customer_reviews.text: I bought the pillows and matching bench pad for my antique porch swing. I searched high and low for a nicely padded one that would match my red swing. The pad is very thick and comfy, the pillow are firm and well made. My only disappointment, both shipped in boxes with no plastic wrap, had I not been home to receive the packages, the rain would have soaked both boxes and the contents. The packages were delivered early and the product is fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Char Sypien

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, bright color!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty addition to my mother-in-laws patio furniture! Really brightens up the look.
customer_reviews.author: DenKatCal

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor throw pillows.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these pillows to blend with a yellow cushion to place on my garden bench.They blend so well.Waiting for spring to place them outside on the bench and drink my coffee. Love them
customer_reviews.author: ungennette brantley

customer_reviews.title: Nice pillows
customer_reviews.text: There nice pillows they drive fast they stay out all the time. Vibrant color holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: nana51

customer_reviews.title: these are so cute
customer_reviews.text: these are the perfect pop of color i needed for my front porch. I am in love
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute outdoor accent pillow
customer_reviews.text: Cute accent pillows. They are almost too full to make a comfortable pillow for outdoor naps on the chaise but otherwise no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: onceabyrne

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Torn between 3 and 4 stars. I Ordered the "Spray" design. As other buyers have mentioned, they are like a grey-turquoise and brown, not green (see customer images). You can tell they were pretty carelessly made. One of my pillows came with some of the stuffing sewn into the seam, and loose strings hanging off. Easy fix, so wasn't a big deal to me. The material is that outdoor pillow fabric which I really like. Easy to clean with kids and dogs. In all, I do love the design and plan to order another set.
customer_reviews.author: Rhianna

customer_reviews.title: So Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Bargain purchase at $16.58. Small and perfect for my glider bench.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Albert

customer_reviews.title: Great Pillows
customer_reviews.text: Durable, colorful and easy to clean - these pillows add just the right touch to the back porch and are sturdy enough to hold up to my border collie carrying them around the backyard. Love the pattern and the material used.
customer_reviews.author: JHar1003

customer_reviews.title: Great Pillows
customer_reviews.text: Great outdoor pillows. Weather resistance and color does not fade. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MVILLA

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than advertised
customer_reviews.text: The pillows I ordered are literally named "Greendale Home Fashions 17" Outdoor Accent Pillows"; however, they are 15" pillows. I thought perhaps I had read the product information incorrectly and numbers were based on diagonal measurements, but that is not the case. I would have given the pillows a four or a five if they were the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Nice accent
customer_reviews.text: I needed to complete the look for a 2-seat bench and found these matching accent pillows. They look great with the coordinating patio set that I got last year, and I'll enjoy the patio view from the inside as well as entertaining outside.
customer_reviews.author: cottonballmama

customer_reviews.title: Nice accent pillow
customer_reviews.text: These go really well with our blue cushions. I wasn't sure of the pattern design but with a solid blue cushion these look great. These are great accent cushion for a good price and I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mindcrime

customer_reviews.title: BUY THESE!!!
customer_reviews.text: The pillows are true to rhe color shown in the pic and are even more beautiful in person!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Beasley

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Got these a couple weeks ago, they’re beautiful. Bright colors, cute design, water rolls right off of them. Just as pictured and described.
customer_reviews.author: aubrey ellis

product_meta.title: Greendale Home Fashions Outdoor Accent Pillows, Summer, Set of 2
product_meta.description: Color:SummerAdd a stylish and contemporary accent to your outdoor furniture with this set of two Greendale Home Fashions 17 inch square accent pillows. Each pillow is overstuffed with 100% soft polyester fill, made from 100% recycled, post-consumer plastic bottles, for added comfort, strength and durability. It's exterior shell is made from a 100% polyester UV-resistant outdoor fabric. A variety of modern prints are available.
feature_bullets: Set includes two 17-inch square accent pillows
Poly fiber fill made from 100-percent recycled, post-consumer plastic bottle
Overstuffed construction for extra comfort and longevity
Shell made in China. Filled and finished in the USA
Cushion dimensions are +/- 2 inches. Please note product will arrive in a slightly compressed state; please allow a few days for product to expand to final size listed in description
